page.title: 06All Saints Church Alburgh
page.content:
All saints Church Albrugh.
The parish of Alburgh has been joined into the united benefice of Alurgh Denton and Earsham, with the rector Rev. John Walden residing in the rectory at Earsham. The church is organised by a Parochial Church Council, elected to office by members of All Saints Church in Alburgh. As in other parish two Church wardens see to the to the day to day running of the building, while the rector works that each of his parisioners should know Jesus Christ as Saviour. About one service a week is held in the church including that of Holy Communion Mattins and a Family Service. Other meeting take place during the week at members houses including Bible Studies Choir practice and Band rehearsals
